deblockFilter.description: Enable or disable the deblock filter when filtering.

denoiseFilter.description: Enable or disable the denoise filter when filtering.

filterStrength.description: Adjusts the magnitude of filtering from 1 (minimal) to 5 (strongest).

inputFilter.description: Turns on the filter for the input.

networkInputSettings.description: Input settings. See Network Input Settings for more details.

scte35Pid.description: PID from which to read SCTE-35 messages.

smpte2038DataPreference.description: Specifies whether to extract applicable ancillary data from a SMPTE-2038 source in the input.

sourceEndBehavior.description: Loop input if it is a file.
